pageContext.description: Bronze, lower, part only. Wings missing.
pageContext.surface: Shows hammer squals and hone scratches
pageContext.other: Length: 8.6 cm, Width: 2.4 cm up to 3.8 cm., Thickness: 2 cm at break.  In another hand: "Almost OK (section)
pageContext.composition: Copper rich bronze. Broken at base of wings. No stop ridge. Deep, V [...], see over,  Well cast with no blow holes.
pageContext.associations: Other hoard finds in same works at same date;, see B. Mus. "Addington, "Kent" (Sic) 1913-14.
pageContext.collection: British Museum. 1960. 5-4. 3, (Found by, Given to "Peter" Mills., Now held by Croydon Public, Library in effects of late, Mr "Peter" Mills.)
pageContext.site: Greater London,  Croydon,  Addington, Golf Course, Found during construction of course 1913-14. See A.P.I. Found "in Addington Park between, the Swiss Lodge and the Golf, House along Shirley Rd", 1913-1914, This during construction of the, Golf Course.
